property.caption: Message
property.description: Message you want to appear on cookie consent request.

property.caption: Location
property.description: Insert one of following: "top", "bottom" or use "none" to disable.

property.caption: Overlay
property.description: Whether to show a page obscuring overlay or not.

property.caption: Disable styles
property.description: If enabled the component will have no default style.

property.caption: Hide on accept
property.description: If disabled the component will not hide it self after the accept button has been clicked. You will need to hide yourself.

property.caption: Accept on scroll
property.description: Defines whether "accept" should be fired after the user scrolls a certain distance (see Accept on scroll percentage)

property.caption: Accept on scroll percentage
property.description: Percentage of the page height the user has to scroll to trigger the accept function if acceptOnScroll is enabled

property.caption: Cookie name
property.description: Name of the cookie used to track whether the user has agreed.

property.caption: Cookie value
property.description: Value to be saved under the cookieName.

property.caption: Decline cookie value
property.description: Value to be saved under the cookieName when declined.

property.caption: Set decline cookie
property.description: Whether to set a cookie when the user clicks "decline".

property.caption: Debug mode
property.description: Bar will be drawn regardless of cookie for debugging purposes.

property.caption: Expires
property.description: Number of days before the cookie expires.

property.caption: Same site
property.description: Cookies sameSite attribute value

property.caption: Cookie security
property.description: Cookie security level. Defaults to true unless running on http.

property.caption: Button text
property.description: Text to appear on the button

property.caption: Decline button text
property.description: Text to appear on the decline button

property.caption: Button Id
property.description: Id to apply to the button

property.caption: Decline button Id
property.description: Id to apply to the decline button

property.caption: Flip buttons
property.description: If enabled the accept and decline buttons will be flipped

property.caption: Use cookies policy page
property.description: Set the environment variable e.g. @Settings.UseCookiesPolicy

property.caption: Policy link
property.description: Link to your cookies policy info page e.g. "/p/cookies"
